repositories.name: ComfyUI-RMBG
repositories.description: A ComfyUI custom node designed for advanced image background removal and object, face, clothes, and fashion segmentation, utilizing multiple models including RMBG-2.0, INSPYRENET, BEN, BEN2, BiRefNet...

repositories.name: ComfyUI-OmniGen
repositories.description: ComfyUI-OmniGen - A ComfyUI custom node implementation of OmniGen, a powerful text-to-image generation and editing model.

repositories.name: ComfyUI-SparkTTS
repositories.description: Advanced text-to-speech system leveraging large language models for natural speech generation.

news.title: ComfyUI-RMBG Major Update
